abstract: JPMorgan Chase has almost doubled the number of its Tokyo commodity traders to meet demand from utilities seeking to use coal-derivatives to hedge against price swings, said a person with knowledge of the expansion, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has almost doubled the number of its Tokyo commodity traders to meet demand from utilities seeking to use coal-derivatives to hedge against price swings, said a person with knowledge of the expansion, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has almost doubled the number of its Tokyo commodity traders to meet demand from utilities seeking to use coal-derivatives to hedge against price swings, said a person with knowledge of the expansion, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: JPMorgan Said to Double Tokyo Commodities Team
